column1: #FORMAT=WebAnno TSV 3.2
#T_SP=webanno.custom.Referent|entity|infstat
#T_RL=webanno.custom.Coref|type|BT_webanno.custom.Referent
#Text=Especially based in New York .
#Text=Especially based in New York , yeah .
#Text=Do you find that when you have friends outside the city , and they know you 're raising kids here , they bate their breath ?
#Text=So many people still have this vision of New York from like " The Warriors , " ; from the Abe Beame days of New York .
#Text=That 's true , it 's true .
#Text=The funny thing is we were just in San Diego and my daughter , who 's three , would just lie on the floor moaning in boredom , because it 's so boring there .
#Text=We were in a couple of houses , one of which had a pool .
#Text=She was fine when there was a pool .
#Text=But the driving -- she just hated it !

#Text=You have to drive to go anywhere , and we could n't find our health-food-store food…and we 're driving around for forty minutes , and she just would sit in the back saying , " I do n't want to live in the suburbs . "
#Text=So many parents think that -- my sister would be one -- the preference of that controlled atmosphere is better for the kids .
#Text=They do n't realize what they lose not living in an urban center .
#Text=Yeah .
#Text=People creating this thriving environment where we can influence each other , and kids --
#Text=-- They love it --
#Text=-- have more stimulus .
#Text=When you see news reports that on the discovery of an Earthlike planet does that affect your perspective or does it go unnoticed ?
#Text=I do n't know ; there 's so much out there that we do n't understand that it 's hard for me to imagine there is n't some larger relationships , somehow .
#Text=Let me see if I can phrase it better : there 's a lot out there we do n't understand .
#Text=If you had to choose , and you had to choose or both would be devastated and destroyed , which continent would you have blown up , Asia or Africa ?
#Text=Asia or Africa !
#Text=I do n't know , I have to blow up one of them ? ?
#Text=Or they both go .
#Text=I would just do it based on population , I guess .
#Text=I do n't know their population figures , but I think that there are more people in Asia , so I think I 'd blow up Africa .
#Text=So it would be a sum total of human life , as opposed to your judgement of cultural significance , or -- ?
#Text=I 'm not sure .
#Text=The land mass thing might figure in , but mainly yeah , just the populations .
#Text=On paedophilia and the death penalty
#Text=What do you regard as the lowest depth of misery ?
#Text=Before I was a parent , I was sort of wishy-washy on the death penalty ; but being a parent makes you conservative about some things .
#Text=My wife is very progressive .
#Text=But then when we talk about a paedophile priest or something , and someone suggests that they be executed , she does n't say anything .
#Text=I do n't think it 's just because there 's a sense of vengeance .
#Text=I think it 's because that would be the most miserable you could possibly be , that I can imagine .
#Text=To a person with such a damaged soul that you would harm a child -- I ca n't imagine anything worse .
